title: Crash !!!
body:
After champions select the loading screen doesn't appear just  black screen. when I hit esc eventualy it sais game crash reconnect. reconnection doesn't work I've tried. 
I then whent to youtube looking for a fix. got one. 
 renaming the Logitech file inside  C:/riot games /lol/ rads/solutions/lol_game_client_sln/release/0.0.1.107/deploy/(rename or deleate Logitech file). then restart

It didn't work 
pls I cant play I feel dead!!!

replies.body: You may need to do a fresh reinstall. You might be missing some Direct X files.

and Burn !!!

run the installer and select repair
